SEARCH
Package net.chaossquad.mclib.scheduler

Schnittstelle SchedulerInterface

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
ChildTaskScheduler, ManagedEntity, RespawningManagedEntity, SingleUseManagedEntity, TaskScheduler, WrappedTaskScheduler
public interface SchedulerInterface
An interface providing methods for task schedulers.

  • Methodendetails

    • scheduleRepeatingTask

      long scheduleRepeatingTask(@NotNull @NotNull TaskRunnable runnable, long delay, long interval, @Nullable @Nullable Removable removeCondition, @Nullable @Nullable String label)
      Creates a new repeating task.
      Parameter:
      runnable - runnable of the task
      delay - how long should be waited to run the task the first time
      interval - how long should be waited to run the task again after the last execution
      removeCondition - a stop condition that will be checked every tick
      label - task label
      Gibt zurück:
      task id (positive if successfully added)

    • scheduleRepeatingTask

    • runTaskLater

      long runTaskLater(@NotNull @NotNull TaskRunnable runnable, long delay, @Nullable @Nullable Removable removeCondition, @Nullable @Nullable String label)
      Creates a new one-time task.
      Parameter:
      runnable - runnable of the task
      delay - how long should be waited in ticks before running the task
      removeCondition - a stop condition that will be checked every tick
      label - task label
      Gibt zurück:
      task id (positive if successfully added)
